website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if your hair is dry and prone to frizziness or split ends.
pros: Deeply moisturizes to help calm dry, frizzy hair
Large bottle lasts a long time
cons: A few have said it left their hair greasy

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware of Different Product Formulations
customer_reviews.text: Although the bottle looks the same, as indicated in the "Ingredients" labeling, there are more than one formulation of this product. Recommend the product coded 0009531113494 as specified in the listing above, but the product with UPC 843992069552 has a very distinct fragrance that I cannot stand. Don't know why the company does not make the distinction between the different formulations more obvious on the bottle as that can lead to a bad purchase and dissatisfied buyer. Poor marketing on their part. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Charles Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years and love it. But the last two bottles I purchased on Amazon were different in that the color was lighter and the consistency was thicker. During the time I used these products my hair was flatter and frizzy, and assumed PM changed the formula. But then I was in a drug store recently and really needed the product before a trip so I purchased it. Since I have been using it - no more frizz, the color is slightly darker and the consistency is lighter. This leads me to believe whatever they are selling online is not the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Suzcar

customer_reviews.title: The SCENT.... AMAZING!!!  I even use it on my skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! The scent alone would motivate me to continue using it! It does exactly what it claims... conditions and without weighing your hair down. I have fine hair, and I still can leave this product in without rinsing and it doesn't weigh it down. I also use it on my skin which it says you can. This product has been around for YEARS, and it hasn't changed. All you need is just a small dime-size amount and it spreads well. This large bottle should last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: D. Dungey

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it leaves my hair
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years, and I think it has served me well. I initially came to this one because of its "leave-in" approach. (I also like that it provides a light degree of "hold", without my having to use a separate product.) I have no 'scientific evidence' to prove how much it has helped me keep my head of dark hair, but being over 70, I'm inclined to believe it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff.... ❤️ I'm so in love with this conditioner and the shampoo. I actually wash out the conditioner and it does a fabulous job. This makes my hair feel amazing! I have tried so many shamps & condos over the years and this one is by far my favorite. I also use a Ren pure deyangler (my hair is down to my belly button) & a biotin collage from walmart. All of them together is now my favorite concoction. I swear by it! If you want beautiful silky hair that looks and smells amazingly. Try this out! You won't regret it! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, some additional Ingredients, Stronger SCENT?
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PRODUCT. NEW FORMULA additionally includes: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract Bbtylene Glycol Soy bean Oil Soyamidopropyl Dimethylamine These ingredients DO NOT Affect the way this "leave-in" conditioner woks...which is great. HOWEVER...i believe it has a stronger scent than that of the Original Formula.. (Oloe-ey?) 😕. Not too crazy for the stronger scent.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo G.

customer_reviews.title: Consistently great product for years
customer_reviews.text: I have used The Conditioner in the past, then got away from it - no particular reason. And just in the last few years I've rediscovered it. It's the same great product as it always was. I have gray hair now and using it as a leave-in conditioner helps keep my hair soft and under control - no fly-aways. My husband also uses it on his beard. Just a little dab will do the job -- and I mean just a little. I have short hair and just use a very small bit. Squirt a little on your palm, rub your palms together a bit, then work it on your hair (particularly the ends).
customer_reviews.author: Estelle D.

customer_reviews.title: yucky
customer_reviews.text: This smells soooo awful. Usually I am not concerned about smells. But folks this is worse than something of your worst nightmares. DON'T DO IT. I tried one from 2 places ....Walgreens and my hair salon and it was wonderful but... the seller either bought this item in the 1800 s or tainted it. I will put it in the trash because I cannot stand the rotten smell.
customer_reviews.author: Chad G. Mandarino

customer_reviews.title: Not real Paul Mitchell
customer_reviews.text: I use this conditioner all the time and what arrived from Amazon was not the real stuff. It smells horrible so I bought another bottle from a shop (so I could smell it first) and I am going to through this one away. I don’t write that many reviews but this stuff is really bad so I wanted to warn other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this identical product several years ago from Amazon and loved it, especially the aroma. Ordered this one a couple of months ago and couldn't believe the difference. Texture and color are different and it has a horrible smell. Waited too long so I can't return!
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: My favorite conditioner for fine Limp hair. I was hesitant to not rinse out the conditioner (as per the instructions) but it does not make your hair greasy. In fact I think it gives it the perfect amount of moisture and also allows me to wear my hair two days. With most other conditioners my hair is too greasy the next morning to not wash again. I put the product in from root to tip but do focus more on the ends than the top part. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Enorth

customer_reviews.title: PM loves naturals
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Conditions my hair very well. My is so moisturized. I have natural hair. It's my new staple product. I like using this product when I straighten my hair. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Paul Mitchell's The Conditioner for years and years. I have naturally curly hair and this product is the key to keeping my curls in big loops instead of getting all frizzy. (I let it dry naturally, no scrunching or anything.) Plus it keeps my hair in really good shape. Protects from sun, chlorine, salt water, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Formula has changed...for the worse.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my new bottle and saw that the color of the conditioner had changed. I tried it anyway and oh, the smell is NOT good. I've been using it for years and it has never had that scent and I can't even keep it in my hair. Plus it doesn't seem to condition at all like it used to. Thank you so much to Amazon CS for letting me return it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Have had itchy scalp a long time, along with a dull lifeless sheen. "A dirty blonde." No more, with Awapuhi by Paul Mitchell. Used conservatively a little goes a LONG way. No more dull itchy scalp, no fly away split ends. My hair is shiny, quite manageable & is full of bounce, all without using other products that promise what you already have with Awapuhi. Be careful, using too much of this conditioner & you'll be Left with a bad, unwanted outcome. Paul Mitchell's Awapuhi shampoo and conditioner leaves your hair squeeky clean bright, shiney, manageable and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Pray

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This a a good conditioner to use after you shampoo and you can rinse it out. It is also good as a leave in conditioner after you are done washing your hair. Towel dry your hair and rub in a dimes worth of conditioner and style as usual. I also put some in a mini spray bottle and mix 50/50 with water and spray it on to my hair for better distribution. Keeps hair manageable and hydrated during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: sue g

customer_reviews.title: It's a leave in conditioner, not a regular one.
customer_reviews.text: The product I feel is intentionally mislabeled in title and quantity to make someone think that it is the conditioner to pair with their shampoo. Its the same bottle as the shampoo, but it's a leave in conditioner, not a regular one.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed and NOT regular conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is not regular conditioner. Being called “the conditioner” I just assumed I was getting... conditioner... No, this is LEAVE IN conditioner... had to return. Should be called “The LEAVE IN Conditioner” Also major warning: does NOT COME SEALED. This could contain poison for all I know.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Not a horrible Conditioner but the smell is off, and it definitely isn’t authentic Paul Mitchell. I returned it and just ordered it from Ulta online.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyvirtigo

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: Bottle looks authentic. Ingredients listing is not quite right. Tried the product. Does not give the same soft texture to hair as the authentic leave in conditioner. I left my hair air dry having fingered a nickle size of the conditioner. Once dry my hair was somewhat brittle. The scent is much like the smell of fake doll hair. That same scent remained even after the conditioner dried on my hair. Definitely had to wash it out. Certainly had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn V. Slayton

customer_reviews.title: Been Using The Conditioner for Years
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other products off and on through the years, but I always come back to Paul Mitchell The Conditioner. I don't think I'll ever even bother to try another product again, because nothing beats this. I put it in my damp hair after shampooing and then scrunch my hair with a microfiber towel, and it really brings out the curl in my hair and prevents the frizzies. Plus I love the way it smells. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a "leave in" conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Great product been using 30 years, I use a small amount and do not rinse it out after using a Mastey mild shampoo. Recommended many years ago by a salon in Boothbay Harbor ME (which was too small for a mens barbershop) to prevent scalp flaking.
customer_reviews.author: mjg

customer_reviews.title: Smells very bad
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this people. You don't want to put something that smells like bad foot odor in your hair. There is something seriously wrong with it. Not the same smell as the same product my stylist uses in the salon.
customer_reviews.author: maidofavalon

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Economical
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this conditioner at Costco, but they no longer carry it, so I was pleased to find it here on Amazon. It works well and, as a "leave in" conditioner, it is easier to use than regular conditioner that needs to be rinsed. Just a little bead each morning does the trick. Not greasy nor heavy--just the right weight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric The Red

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on my prior to me turning hair into a haystack.
customer_reviews.text: The Conditioner works well on the 4 inches of hair from my scalp down. It keeps my hair smooth and soft. However now having said ever, ever since I damaged my hair from too many bleach sessions it doesn’t offer enough moisture. I think if I mix it with another product on my haystack it will be my favorite once again.
customer_reviews.author: Me Too

customer_reviews.title: Great leave in conditioner for fine curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this leave in conditioner. Made my scalp not flaky at all. Smoothed my curly frizzy hair and even made it feel stronger. Love it can finally say for the price that this is one of the best leave in conditioners over ever purchased. Would recommend to someone like me that has fine curly hair and wants a nice in expensive leave in conditioner. I can only comb my hair while it's wet with conditoner in it and this does the part. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Really good product worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: This leave-in conditioner is a great buy and leaves your hair looking styled and conditioned. No need to buy gel when you can use this in your hair. It will not dry your hair out and it has a great feel to it. It doesn't leave your hair sticky or hard feeling like gel does. A little goes a long ways so it will last you quite a while and is good for the whole family to use.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same quality product I used years ago. I’m tired of using products that seem to change their formula every few months to please a fickle public. As soon as you find the product you love, they change it! I love this conditioner. It’s a leave in conditioner but I find it heavier than my short hair needs. I used a bit in shower then rinsed off, perfect for me, then followed by a styling gel.
customer_reviews.author: LMD

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great hair!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner! Its great! ...with a light, pleasant fragrance and its a leave in conditioner that really works to moisturize your hair and doesnt add that "poofy volume" some other conditioners do and also leaves hair more manageable without stylers or fixatives! Just massage into damp hair, style and go! Have used this product for decades, very happy to have found on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: TranquilOne

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I've always known Paul Mitchell to be a good brand name, but I really don't care for the scent at all - it's almost smells medicinal, and it also leaves the ends of my hair sorta stiff and crunchy if I let it air-dry. I specifically got this because I swim nearly every day and wanted something that would help get the chlorine out, but I'm just not impressed. There's definitely better conditioners out there.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Nomadica

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for over 20 years
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair with inconvenient cowlicks. The Conditioner works great. It's very light, not like gel. It tames the cowlick but my hair can still be combed and it's not stiff. I also use it as a moisturizer for my face. It's not oily and it does a great job. My hair stylists recommends it for this and even for shaving (which I've never tried).
customer_reviews.author: Scottwestcoast

customer_reviews.title: Well purchase again. Quality = salon
customer_reviews.text: Due to covet 19 we have not been able to find our favorite conditioner. Amazon made that possible for us. We have uses every day since she was a baby and she's 14. When she ran out we didn't know what to do. So glad Amazon had this available and the quality appears to be the same as from the salon
customer_reviews.author: BonnieW

customer_reviews.title: Amazon can and should do better preventing fraud.
customer_reviews.text: Fake. Fake. Fake. You will know after one use. Amazon where is your quality control? Anyone can sell anything? Can I print my own labels and sell whatever I want - call it whatever I want? Be better. This makes me think twice about ordering pills and vitamins. How are you verifying the legitimacy of products? This is unacceptable when your profits are at an all time high. Reconsider Prime memberships, everyone.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it more for a gel/hair styler. It is very versatile, use a lot and you gel your hair, use a little and it is like putting wax in your hair. I also like how I'm styling my hair while using conditioner. The delivery came really fast and the bigger sized bottle is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevo

customer_reviews.title: This works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizes and conditions my hair without weighing it down. It smells lovely but the scent isn’t overpowering and the best part is that it’s so easy to use since it’s a leave-in conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Use Every Day
customer_reviews.text: I use this after I get out of the pool every day. I wash my hair with Paul Mitchell Shampoo 3, followed by Paul Mitchell The Detangler (rinse out in the shower) then Paul Mitchell The Conditioner (leave in conditioner). I don't have pool hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie B

customer_reviews.title: Leave-in conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was a leave-in product but I use it anyways. I still use a regular rinse out conditioner in the shower. I put a little bit of this in my hair and comb it through. You would not use as much as you would of a traditional conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Vansil

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The scent is weird but not terrible. Probably one of the best leave in conditioners I’ve used though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kever

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this stuff on and off for 30 yrs. It is the same stuff it was back then and it smooths out my hair and gets rid of the frizz but doesn't make it look oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not awapuhi!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of the fragrance which claimed to be awapuhi; that was a big lie!!!! I have the shampoo and it certainly has awapuhi fragrance, but this conditioner does not that fragrance. For the lie, it doesn’t deserve even one star!
customer_reviews.author: Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Don't think this is real
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem like genuine product, no seal on bottle, overfilled aqua in color. Smells almost fishy when applying, maybe it's gone bad? Did not make my hair soft as expected I have to question if this was a bait and switch sell
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Paul Mitchell products since I was a teenager and I'm nearing 50 now. I think that says alot about the quality of the products!
customer_reviews.author: Christine W.

customer_reviews.title: Always good.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great conditioner...always has been. I've been using it since the 80's....so it's nothing new for me. I put in on my hair, and shave with it...and sometimes even as a moisturizer. It's a real good product, but everyone already kinda knows that. Thanks..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: plus it smells amazing. I don't have to use too much of ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. I'm 29, and my mom started using it on me when I was 7 or so. Every now and then I switch it up and try other products and I always come back to this one. It's light, it keeps my hair moisturized and smooth all day (and longer), plus it smells amazing. I don't have to use too much of it even though my kinky/curly/natural hair (3c/4a) is about a foot long.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca M. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant scent and color
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I found the smell and color (blue?) very unpleasant. I used it 3 times and decided it was not for me. My hair felt dry after using this conditioner. I tried using different amounts with same results. In the end, the scent decided it for me.
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.title: Not great for fine blonde hair
customer_reviews.text: Somehow this is a light conditioner, yet still leaves my fine hair a bit greasy. Doesn’t seem to move through my wet hair well and I always end up regretting using it. Love other PM products though!
customer_reviews.author: J. Royall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the mockery.
customer_reviews.text: I like to rave about this stuff to my family, who have taken to joking about my zealotry and proselytizing spirit. I'll make no apologies, though. This stuff is excellent, long-lasting, and, dare I say it, life-changing.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac S.

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell’s leave-in conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it enables me to handle my hair. One issue is that it turns “white” immediately after massaging it into the wet hair. It appears to be totally absorbed into the hair after several hours. I suspect that it is related to the amount I use. Otherwise, I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner smells horrible ... I stopped using it after a few days. The shampoo is better but I use a different conditioner brand. Not that moisturizing as it states.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to replace a KB2 brand leave-in conditioner. This product works fine, but has slightly less "hold" than what I was using previously. Seems like the genuine PM product that I recall from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Boyo

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a good price!
customer_reviews.text: My bf is the one using this product, and he’s been using it for years! When we saw we could purchase it on Amazon, it was a no brainer, we saved a few $$ :) This is a large bottle too (1 liter) and it lasts my bf forever.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherMarie83

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful
customer_reviews.text: This is the a ridiculous product! The conditioner is an unnatural blue color with an unpleasant oder. Going back to Detangler.
customer_reviews.author: Azmo

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for approximately 27 years and I love it. This bottle will probably last me long after it’s experation date but... I love it and a tiny bit goes a long way, you only need a small amount ( about the size of a dime/quarter) depending on how long your hair is, maybe even less if your hair is short but mine is very long.
customer_reviews.author: liz bess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this conditioner. I always buys the shampoo and conditioner and they last me a long time, plus they add a nice shine and some volume to my thin hair. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Something is different here
customer_reviews.text: OK so I could be wrong but I have been using Paul Mitchell The Conditioner for years. Unless they changed the formula this definitely had a very different smell from what I have been using for years. It looks the same. It feels the same. Just has a very different smell.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Useless!
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair feel dryer than if I didn’t use conditioner at all! Couldn’t comb out my hair after shower. I did hair for 15 years and biolage products were awesome then. Maybe this stuff is a Knock off
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Nanette Marsh

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Scent is not my favorite. But not bad. Waxy smell. Didn't realize it was leave in conditioner until I got it, but it will be used. Just prefer rinse conditioner
customer_reviews.author: Chicameaux

customer_reviews.title: Excelleny conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is an after-shampoo conditioner. Put a small amount in your hand, rub it, and comb it in to give luster without odor or greasiness. I am an old man, and without this my hair lacks any of the luster it once had, so that I really need this conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: George Lewinnek

customer_reviews.title: like the conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed a difference since I started using the conditioner after shampooing with Paul Mitchell III. The shampoo alone was fine, but the conditioner makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Sue

customer_reviews.title: Paul Mitchell Leave In Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Good moisturizer. Just lightly apply to hands & then run your fingers thru your hair. Works great. Bought the travel size & it fits nicely into my overnight bag.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My hair loves this. It softens it without making it too heavy and allows it to naturally curl. It doesn’t make my thin hair look greasy, which is always a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Second favorite leave-in!
customer_reviews.text: I heard so many great things about this leave-in. I have naturally curly hair that is fairly thick. I normally use Giovanni's weightless leave in, but this is by far one of my favorites. Although I hate the smell, this conditioner works wonders on my hair. It makes detangling a breeze and leaves my hair soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Mor3na

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product for course or curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My husband Has been using this conditioner for over 30 years. He has very curly and coarse hair and this really softens it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Im in the ocean a lot and that dries my hair out. The leave in moisturizer keeps my long hair from excess damage.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Rater

customer_reviews.title: Gives your hair great body
customer_reviews.text: Although I've used Paul Mitchell for years I never tried this leave in conditioner. You towel dry your hair and add just a small amount, my hair short, and it doesn't feel greasy and give your hair a lot of body. I'm pretty sold on it
customer_reviews.author: Lois F

customer_reviews.title: Not conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It’s not conditioner. It’s a leave in product, don’t ge fooled like I was lol
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Joy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't be able to comb my wet hair w/out this
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this over 15 years. Happy to find it here at a good, competitive price so I don't have to go to a salon to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: It’s a knock off buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this item is real Paul Mitchell shampoo. Smells different and looks different. Might be a knock off. This shampoo sucks. I’m not sure what I’m putting into my hair
customer_reviews.author: Kevin V.

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: This leave-in conditioner smells awful and does not work well. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have been using it for shaving from the beginning. 25 years. No bumps burning or irritation. Please don’t ever stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Best leave in Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this leave in Conditioner for years. I sometimes had a hard time finding it so was thrilled to find it on Amazon. It conditions and detangles without the added step of rinsing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been out of this conditioner for quite some time and was happy to find it sold by Amazon. My husband and I loved it. You cannot go wrong with this conditioner. It is great consistency and so much more convenient then other applied conditioners and waiting a few minutes to rinse. It agrees with my hair immensely with always good results. Delivery was a day earlier then stated
customer_reviews.author: Maxanne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything, looking for something cheaper now that I'm getting older. Couldn't find anything you didn't have to use twice as much. Love it makes hair say looking good with out grease
customer_reviews.author: douglas baldasaro

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: As always, you get what you pay for. You can expect high quality products with a high quality price tag. However, buying from Amazon you save a few dollars over the brick and mortar stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mild scent, and lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Paul Mitchell products for years. This conditioner is great, and it takes only a small amount to make my hair softer and more controllable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kent harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Every Day Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Paul Mitchell "The Conditioner" is hard to beat for daily hair care. I've been using it for decades and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to conditioner for many years. I have tried others but alway go back to this one. It doesn’t weigh my hair down and takes away the static.
customer_reviews.author: PHwalker

customer_reviews.title: Best leaving I have tried in decades been using it for a very long time I love it!
customer_reviews.text: hair conditioner leave in. I’ve been using this product for decades and it is just absolutely the best not too heavy wonderful product. I have naturally curly dry silver white hair and I’ll tell you if they ever quit making this I’d be lost.
customer_reviews.author: wendy haynes phelps

customer_reviews.title: Always Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 20 years! I feel it is the best on the market for a ‘leave in conditioner.”

product_meta.title: Paul Mitchell The Conditioner
product_meta.description:
Size:10.14 Fl OzGet hair into shape with The Conditioner, the original leave-in conditioner from Paul Mitchell. It contains Hawaiian awapuhi to help balance moisture, while soy-derived conditioners improve hair texture. This versatile conditioner also smoothes hair, reduces static and prevents dryness. Added bonus: It doubles as an excellent moisturizer for the skin. Hair Type: Ideal for All Hair Types. Fragrance: Refreshing herbal scent of lavender and rosemary entwined with leafy greens. Did You Know? The Conditioner™ is one of the very first products launched in the original Paul Mitchell line.

BRAND STORY
Paul Mitchell is results-driven hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
